Place Bootstrap v5.x files here (offline use):

Required:
- bootstrap.min.css

Optional (if you want Bootstrap JS components):
- bootstrap.bundle.min.js  (includes Popper)

Download from:
- CSS: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.3/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css
- JS:  https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.3/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js

Save as:
public/assets/vendor/bootstrap.min.css
public/assets/vendor/bootstrap.bundle.min.js
